item.title: 小米电视4a ADB
item.description: 小米电视4a ADB adb命令 adb connect ip:port adb disconnect adb devices adb push adb shell adb shell am monitor 监听启动的软件 adb shell pm uninstall –user 0 com.catchingnow.icebox 删除软件 删除升级 adb shell pm uninstall –user 0 com.xiaomi.mitv.upgrade 删除广告 adb shell pm uninstall –user 0 com.miui.systemAdSolution adb shell pm
